response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,500. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs and budget, so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 12500}
